TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WrapMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how a texture or gradient is tiled when it is smaller than the area being filled.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Brushes use this enumeration to determine how shapes are filled. To see examples of the effects the WrapMode enumeration values have on a tiled image, see [How to: Tile a Shape with an Image](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a new bitmap using the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.FromFile%2A> method. It also demonstrates a <xref:System.Drawing.TextureBrush> and the WrapMode enumeration. This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. Create a form containing a button named `Button2`. Paste the code into the form and associate the `Button2_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
[!code-cs[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.drawing.drawing_5_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.drawing.drawing_5_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.drawing.drawing_5_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode Clamp = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The texture or gradient is not tiled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode Tile = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode TileFlipX = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Reverses the texture or gradient horizontally and then tiles the texture or gradient.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode TileFlipXY = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Reverses the texture or gradient horizontally and vertically and then tiles the texture or gradient.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode TileFlipY = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Reverses the texture or gradient vertically and then tiles the texture or gradient.
